import React, {useState} from 'react'; import './Modal.css'; const Modal = ({note, closeModal, updatedNote}) => { const [title, setTitle] = useState(note ? note.title : ""); const [text, setText] = useState(note ? note.text : ""); if(!note) { return null; } const handleOutsideClick = (e) => {} return (
keep
add_alert person_add palette image archive more_vert undo redo
) } export default Modal
